Headline: #49 Western and #X49 Western Express Temporary Reroute near Western/34th
ShortDescription: #49 Western, #X49 Western Exp. buses rerouted NB: Western, 35th, Western Blvd., and Western; SB: Western, 31st, California, 35th, and Western near Western/34th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#49 Western and #X49 Western Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Western/34th due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via Western, 35th, Western Blvd., and Western.

Southbound buses will operate via Western, 31st, California, 35th, and Western.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 59th/Cicero
ShortDescription: Eastbound 59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via Midway Terminal, 59th, Cicero, 55th, Pulaski, and 59th due to, street blockage near 59th/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via Midway Terminal, 59th, Cicero, 55th, Pulaski, and 59th, due to street blockage near 59th/Cicero.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 59th/Cicero
ShortDescription: EB 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via Midway Terminal, 59th, Cicero, 55th, Pulaski, and 63rd due to, street blockage near 59th/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via Midway Terminal, 59th, Cicero, 55th, Pulaski, and 63rd due to, street blockage near 59th/Cicero.

Westbound buses are not affected.
